:::Banzai-Tron:::

::he had been gone from the battle for a long time now.  Giant battles like 
that weren't his style. he came across the Chivtron base.  He saw that there 
was some fighting outside, and he didn't want to get involved.  he walked in 
back of the base and shot his way inside. He walked around inside for awhile, 
and was about to leave, when he saw a female.  he grinned::
Banzai-Tron: The femmes are the most fun! DIE MOLLY!(dont ask; hes insane).
::He fired full power at Technosis::

--part1_f6.9353bc0.280e4611_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
